protective_factors: Explicit denial of intent/plan related to passive ideation
Willingness to engage in treatment plan (medication change, behavioral activation)
risk_factors: Current passive suicidal ideation ('Wish to disappear')
Severe functional impairment (missed 3 days of work)
Severe depressive symptoms (early morning awakening, weight loss, strong guilt/worthlessness)
Inadequate response to initial *Sertraline* trial (4 weeks at 50mg)
clinical_actions: Monitor response to *Sertraline* 100mg closely (especially within the next 2 weeks).
Provide crisis resources and reinforce the family deterrent as an implicit safety plan.
Schedule follow-up appointment sooner than typical due to symptom severity.
